content.html: Like, when the content of your article is 100% about what an abusive shithead of an employer he is, maybe find an illustrative photo where he's frowning, instead of one that looks like it should be captioned "tee hee". You can do it. I know you can.
content.value:
Like, when the content of your article is 100% about what an abusive shithead of an employer he is, maybe find an illustrative photo where he's frowning, instead of one that looks like it should be captioned "tee hee".

You can do it. I know you can.
